function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Comparisons of wtp for hems across electricity-use and risk perception groups may lead to unequal access to health-enhancing features based on perceived risk and electricity use.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation or incorrect data through the kg","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate management of green spaces may lead to the spread of contagious diseases among humans and animals.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on specific pollutants for outdoor air ventilation rate determination","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential data breaches","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systemic gap in the health sector: shortage of manpower, equipment, drugs, and testing capacity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of updating information on signs over time during the pandemic.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Metropolitan area-specific study","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overcrowding in indoor spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Political approaches to sustainability","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate results or bias","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid change in technology for ecosystem surveillance","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate simulation results leading to incorrect conclusions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased economic support may lead to complacency in adhering to public health guidelines, leading to a higher risk of contagion.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited food supplies due to poverty and unemployment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate governance models","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of pathogens or dust through the exhaust ducts","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adoption of blockchain technology for covid-19 apps","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or outdated information from
